document.full_text: the rally was a potent show of support for the former prime minister, saad hariri, who moved into the opposition after hezbollah and its allies forced the collapse of his government in january.
document.title: thousands in lebanon demand hezbollah be disarmed
lines_and_colors: the rally was a potent show of support for the former prime minister, saad hariri, who moved into the opposition after hezbollah and its allies forced the collapse of his government in january.
